edge_1: When Amsterdam's gang beats McGloin, one of Bill's lieutenants, Bill and the Natives march on the church. Amsterdam and the Dead Rabbits meet them peacefully but Bill promises to return soon.
edge_2: Corrupt Irish policeman and former Dead Rabbit Mulraney to investigate, but Amsterdam garrotes him to death and hangs his body in the square

edge_1: When Amsterdam's gang beats McGloin, one of Bill's lieutenants, Bill and the Natives march on the church. Amsterdam and the Dead Rabbits meet them peacefully but Bill promises to return soon.
edge_2: After the incident at the church, Amsterdam challenges Bill to a gang battle in Paradise Square. However, the Civil War draft riots break out and Union Army soldiers are deployed to control the rioters. During the gang fight, naval gunfire interrupts it shortly before it begins, many of the gang members are killed by the naval gunfire, soldiers, or rioters.

edge_1: When Amsterdam's gang beats McGloin, one of Bill's lieutenants, Bill and the Natives march on the church. Amsterdam and the Dead Rabbits meet them peacefully but Bill promises to return soon.
edge_2: After killing Bill, Amsterdam buries his father's knife next to Priest Vallon in a cemetery in Brooklyn and erects a makeshift headstone with the name William Cutting over it now alongside the actual tombstone of Priest Vallon.
